text: The Cord of Life is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Cord of LifeIra H. Gallen. D.W. Griffith: Master of Cinema and stars Charles Inslee, Marion Leonard, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Charles Inslee as Galora * Marion Leonard as Galora's Wife * George Gebhardt as Antonine * Linda Arvidson as In Tenement * Dorothy Bernard * Clara T. Bracy * John R. Cumpson as In Tenement * Charles K. French * Charles Gorman * Guy Hedlund * Anita Hendrie as In Tenement * Arthur V. Johnson as Policeman * Florence Lawrence as In Tenement * Adolph Lestina * David Miles as In Tenement * Gertrude Robinson as On Street * Mack Sennett as Policeman * Harry Solter as On Street * Dorothy West as In Tenement ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Cord of Life
